entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
